articles.description: Sony BRAVIA 55X90J review: Priced at Rs 1,39,990, Sony shows that it is still possible to offer premium features at a time when prices of 4K televisions are falling every coming year.
articles.content: Televisions now are nothing like the stupid idiot boxes they used to be. Even as content made for televisions become dumber by the day, the actual devices are gaining their own level of intelligence,… [+5311 chars]
